programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.desc: The Stars seek redemption against the Golden Knights in Game 1 of their first-round series. Vegas won all three meetings this season after ousting Dallas in six games in the 2023 Western Conference finals. The Stars are 26-11-4 at home in 2023-24.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.desc: Mark Stone and the Golden Knights square off against the Stars in Game 2 of their West first-round series. Stone, playing for the first time since Feb. 20 because of a lacerated spleen, scored the first goal as Vegas held off Dallas 4-3 in Game 1.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.desc: The Golden Knights triumphantly return home, up 2-0 entering Game 3 of their first-round series with the Stars. Vegas outscored Dallas 7-4 in Texas, with Jonathan Marchessault and Jack Eichel each posting a goal and an assist in a 3-1 Game 2 win.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.desc: The Stars look to tie up their first-round series against the Golden Knights, down 2-1 in Game 4. Wyatt Johnson's second goal of the game, and the series, was the overtime winner for Dallas in a 3-2 Game 3 decision over Vegas in the desert.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.desc: The Stars try for a lead over the Golden Knights in Game 5 of their Western Conference first-round series. Dallas completed a road sweep in Vegas with a 4-2 triumph in Game 4. Stars forward Wyatt Johnston netted his third goal of the series.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.desc: The Stars seek to slay the Golden Knights in Game 6 of their Western Conference quarterfinal. Dallas seized a 3-2 series lead with a 3-2 victory May 1. In NHL history, the winner of Game 5 when a series is tied 2-2 advances at a 79% rate.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.desc: The West's top seed, Dallas, hosts Vegas for Game 7 of this Western Conference quarterfinal. The Golden Knights snapped a three-game skid and stayed alive by blanking the Stars 2-0 in Game 6. Each side owns one playoff series victory over the other.

programme.desc: Jim and Jason Roussos travels to Ethiopia, Africa to hunt for hippo with his muzzleloader.

programme.desc: Bouncing from camp to camp in Jim Shockey's Rogue River Outfitting territory, the Yukon; Jim's guides escort their clients to giant Alaska Yukon moose.

programme.title: The Lindsey Way
programme.desc: There is no place on earth like the Cactus Jack Ranch and we're back for another South Texas rut hunt; the boys are in for an action packed week chasing south Texas monarchs.

programme.title: Addicted to the Outdoors
programme.desc: Jon Brunson took his daughter Raven up to Four Horse Outfitters in Wyoming and she was able to take her first antelope ever; it's his son Gunner's turn to try to do the same.

programme.title: Whitetail Freaks
programme.desc: Troy and Jacob Landry make their annual visit to KandiLand; the Landrys and Kiskys entertain at camp and hunt for some big Iowa bucks.

programme.title: The Bucks of Tecomate
programme.desc: David Morris is at Cactus Jack Ranch chasing a Giant 8; it may prove to be one of his favorites.

programme.title: American Bird Hunter
programme.desc: Bruce's friends enjoy their first trip to Canada for waterfowl hunting.

programme.title: The Flush
programme.desc: Bill Sherck hikes the Superior Trail in search of ruffed grouse.

programme.title: The Fowl Life With Chad Belding
programme.desc: The Fowl Life Crew head north of the border to hunt where it all began, Buck Paradise Outfitters.

programme.title: Nick's Wild Ride With Nick Hoffman
programme.desc: Nick heads to Utah to hunt mule deer and visits his sister Jessica. He tries his hand at the ancient craft of making pottery but quickly finds that might not be his calling.

programme.title: Dropped: Land of the Living Skies
programme.desc: Symptoms of starvation have set in for Chris and Casey, who haven't eaten in days.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Shock Therapy
programme.desc: Jim Shockey and Ivan Carter, two legends of hunting and conservation, discuss everything uncharted.

programme.title: Bowlife
programme.desc: After drawing a coveted elk tag, Levi has an experience of a lifetime.

programme.title: Archer's Choice With Ralph & Vicki

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The NCIS team works with Hetty's former Vietnam War colleagues, A.J. Chegwidden, Sterling Bridges and Charles Langston, on a gold heist investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When Sam's wife, Michelle, is taken from her home, the kidnappers demand that Sam's arch nemesis, Tahir Khaled, be released from prison in exchange for Michelle's whereabouts.

Buck jumps back into the dating scene but fears he will return to his old ways; a woman goes to great extremes on a freeway overpass to get the attention of her husband; a couple have a car accident on their wedding day.

During the holidays, the first responders must deal with a stampede at a toy store, a mistletoe stunt gone awry and neighbors competing in a Christmas light showdown; Bobby contemplates his future with Athena; Chimney and Buck try to help Maddie.
Bobby meets Athena's parents for the first time; Maddie attempts to end her marriage for good, causing Doug to insinuate himself even deeper into Chimney's life.
Looking back at how Chimney joined Station 118 and became the firefighter and paramedic he is today.
The first responders rally together to search for a missing Maddie.

The call center is hit with a system-wide power outage and must go old school to respond to emergencies; the first responders must deal with explosions in multiple homes and a difficult child birth; Michael confronts Bobby about parenting his kids.
After his devastating family tragedy in Minnesota, Bobby Nash moves to Los Angeles to start over, where he becomes captain of the 118 and meets Athena Grant for the first time.
The first responders deal with a calamity at a chocolate factory; a mail bomb explosion; Eddie receives some surprising news from Shannon; Maddie contemplates her future in the call center.

A stunt driver is caught in a hairy situation; a teenage social influencer is bugging out; the city is on high alert after two mail bombs go off; Eddie's family comes to town; Buck faces a life-or-death situation.

As the citywide blackout continues to cause mayhem in Los Angeles, Athena races to save her family from a tragedy; Eddie must make a difficult choice about his future; Maddie makes a life-changing decision.

A truck crashes into a high school homecoming parade; Athena and Michael try to help Harry in the aftermath of his kidnapping; May is intimidated by a returning call center legend; Bobby gives a devastated Chimney advice regarding Maddie.
A man over-exerts himself exercising; a groundskeeper is cut by his chainsaw; an explosion occurs at a retirement community; May gets an emergency call from a suicidal teen.
Responding to a fire at a prison, Bobby and the 118 find themselves trapped in a deadly riot.

A man claims he was carjacked, shot and buried alive; a homeowner thinks her roommate is a ghost; Hen receives a visit from the past; Athena and family are concerned that Harry is still haunted by visions of Jeffrey.
Bobby and the 118 race to save lives after an explosion rocks the hospital where Dr. David Hale is performing surgery; Michael makes a life-changing decision.

An abandoned oil well erupts and causes a massive sinkhole in downtown LA; Athena investigates a 30-year-old cold case involving a casino robbery; Buck fears his relationship with Taylor might be ending.
The members of the 118 are called to a series of emergencies around Christmas Eve; Eddie struggles with an emotional Christopher.

Athena, Bobby and the 118 must rescue a family whose pick-up truck has been rigged with a pipe bomb that will detonate if the vehicle slows down and goes under 55 mph; Eddie has a rough transition into his new job; Buck makes a relationship decision.
Chimney is determined to find a missing Maddie amongst the chaos of St. Patrick's Day.

Athena investigates a robbery at a gas station; Bobby and the 126 race to rescue a novice diver who panics while in a shark cage; Eddie reaches his breaking point; Maddie shares some news with Buck, who realizes he has to come clean with Taylor.

The members of the 118 race into action when a women falls over her balcony; Athena investigates when a bike rider is impaled on a stop sign; Eddie begins his therapy for his PTSD and survivor's guilt; Maddie fears the worst when Jee-Yun falls ill.

A social media influencer has an accident in a sauna; an emergency at a reality show wedding; a tragedy when a mother and her daughter go hiking; Maddie worries she has missed too many firsts with Jee-Yun.

The 118 races to the rescue when the call center goes up in flames; Bobby risks his life to save a trapped May and Claudette; Buck and Eddie must help an injured electrician; Chimney and his brother team up as firefighters for the first time.

After a mysterious death, Hen and Chimney put their lives in danger when they suspect that someone is playing God to make themselves look like a hero; Eddie visits Texas, where he attempts to reconcile with his father.

Members of the 118 attempt to rescue a wellness retreat guru after his followers turn on him; an emergency call at an upscale hair salon; Maddie contemplates returning to work; Eddie and May make decisions about their future.

programme.title: Prairie Pursuit
programme.desc: Mike and the gang go on a successful elk hunt in northern Saskatchewan followed by a hunt for a mule deer in the south that includes a 300 yard shot from a talented young hunter.

programme.title: Passion For The Hunt
programme.desc: Field hunting North Dakota waterfowls in a picked corn field just west of Devils Lake; mixed bag of ross geese, snow geese, mallards and Canada geese over field decoys.

programme.title: Savage Outdoors
programme.desc: Iowa is literally what a whitetail hunter's dreams are made of. Rather you're shotgun hunting, or archery hunting, nowhere is comparable to Iowa.

programme.title: Yamaha's Whitetail Diaries
programme.desc: Hunting whitetail with shotguns is a underrated way to harvest whitetail; Trevor from HIVIZ comes to camp to take on that challenge.

programme.title: Unleashed Global Adventures
programme.desc: Larysa Switlyk travels to the Big Island of Hawaii to hunt wild goats and black Hawaiian sheep; her guide helped her catch her first striped marlin ten years ago, now he's guiding her on an active volcano for the critters that roam this island.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: The boys are back hunting axis in the spring during the rut.

programme.title: Reel West Coast
programme.desc: Brendan and Rob move to a new location to target tuna and salmon off the coast of Chile; fishing beside penguins and sight casting to tuna while only 100 meters from shore is a new experience for both of these veteran anglers.

programme.title: Fishing the Wild West
programme.desc: Wes takes part in the tagging and conservation efforts to protect the white sturgeon in British Columbia.

programme.title: Antler Ice's Bone Cold TV
programme.desc: The Grey Ghost of the Arizona mountains followed by a West Texas aoudad hunt.

programme.title: Non-Typical Nation
programme.desc: Brody Teale and his father pursue Saskatchewan wild boar with D R Outfitting; the duo had an action-packed hunt.

programme.title: Red Arrow
programme.desc: Kip kicks off the 16th season in the great state of Georgia; the bucks are still in bachelor groups this time of year and most of them are still in velvet.

programme.title: Mitchell Payment's Moment of Truth TV
programme.desc: Mitchell is after a whitetail buck with his bow; not being able to catch a break, it changes in the blink of an eye.

programme.title: Whitetail Frenzy
programme.desc: Kenny is in Colorado hoping to fill an elk tag for the third consecutive year.

programme.title: Deer & Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Special 20th-anniversary episode; a nostalgic journey through two decades of hunting television.

programme.title: How to Hunt With Ryan Kohler
programme.desc: Bear hunting in the heart of the wilderness with Ryan Kohler, as he teams up with former NHL star Shawn Matthias and outdoor enthusiast Zack Brown from

programme.title: Big Tracks & Heavy Racks 2023
programme.desc: This month's 90 minute marathon featuring Wild TV's best moose and elk hunts will get viewers primed for this fall's hunt.

programme.title: SG Adventures
programme.desc: Jason heads back to his home province of New Brunswick for bears with Lindy Ridge.

programme.title: Outdoor Bound TV
programme.desc: Dennis Butz, owner of No Butz About It guide service, visits the bay of Green Bay.

programme.title: Breaking Spring
programme.desc: The boys from The Breaking Point close out their Wisconsin spring turkey season with their annual

programme.title: Innerloc's Out-There
programme.desc: A very emotional hunt as Corey puts down his Expedition bow and picks up a mid 70's bow that belonged to his late Pop Pop. Corey comes face to face with a 180 whitetail in Kansas.

programme.title: The Outdoorsman With Buck McNeely
programme.desc: A Springbok safari in South Africa; a reindeer adventure in Greenland; Buck's last hunt in Missouri for whitetail deer.

programme.title: The Breaking Point
programme.desc: Mike Mancl heads to western North Dakota for another round of chasing mule deer; Aaron Skrzypczak heads North Dakota on his first ever spot and stalk archery mule deer hunt.

programme.title: 704 Outdoors
programme.desc: The team prepares a property to help a landowner with their wild hog problem; it doesn't take long before they are ready to clock in the thermals.

programme.title: Hunting With HECS
programme.desc: HECS patented technology was launched in 2010; chronicling the HECS story from beginning to today.

programme.title: Flyways Finest
programme.desc: Dave is back in Saskatchewan with Northern Skies Outfitters.

programme.title: Higdon Outdoors TV

programme.desc: Claudio takes a group of five hunters on a spec and duck combo and manages to wrap it up with 40 ducks, 40 specs and four snows in on a morning.

programme.desc: Much of the trapline is finally in; Rich checks for a little bit of everything.

programme.desc: They call them Reef Donkeys for a reason. With a bait well of live bait, no telling what Capt Todd and Capt Jamie may find.

programme.title: Guide's Tails
programme.desc: Guide's Tails showcases the top guides from around the nation in both fresh and saltwater, inshore and offshore. We will take you inside each unique fishery, and drop in to visit local tackle retailers and get some local flavor.

programme.desc: Marc heads to Wisconsin for his annual turkey hunt with Pat and Pats grandkids.

programme.title: Americana Outdoors
programme.desc: A look at a mix of new turkey hunting products that will make anyone's time in the field more successful; a chance to see the products in action on several hunts.

programme.title: Hunt Warz
programme.desc: The competition intensifies as two hunter athletes have filled their tags, although one hunter shot his buck late and had to back out and try to find his buck the next day.

programme.title: Fly Fusion
programme.desc: Today we're headed to another stretch of water in an iconic part of Wyoming to fish in Yellowstone National Park. I'm joined by Paula Shearer and writer, editor and angler, Kirk Deeter as we explore an unnamed stream in a famed section of the park.

programme.title: Final Approach Presents
programme.desc: The birds are feeding heavily with so much grain and corn stuffed in their craws that they must slip in for a drink to try and digest; the hole is small and finishing greenheads in this spot is incredible.

programme.title: Sporting Classics with Chris Dorsey
programme.desc: Chris Dorsey and guests pursue quail, hog and redfish at Brays Island Plantation in South Carolina.
